    • findByTopicIdAndMemberNameAndSince

      @Query(" select p from Post p join Member m on m.id=p.authorId where p.topicId= ?1 and m.name =?2 and p.date >= ?3") java.util.List<Post> findByTopicIdAndMemberNameAndSince​(java.util.UUID id, java.lang.String memberName, java.util.Date since)
